Business logic

  • Here is where you sanitize, manipulate and check for request parameters and craft the final response.
  • The exported model function is available under the reserved process keyword
  • The request object is available under the request keyword
  • The response object is available under the response keyword
  • In order to terminate the execution of the code you should use the return keyword
console.log(request); // { fullName: "Ben Goertzel" } response.message = "Hello" + request.fullName; response.result = process(request.fullName); return;
